idea: The Idea is to manufacture micronized PE waxes which finds its application in paint and ink industry , the technology globally is expensive and hence the product is either imported or sold at a very high price in India, We have invented our own method of micronizing PE wax by using machinery used in Grinding of Spices , since machines are used for a very different application , with certain modifications and creativity we can use spice machine in micronizing PE wax and this substitute import and also export products globally.
name: Yadavi Technologies Pvt Ltd
